name: Scream Or Die!
description: A prototype developed during "Global Game Jam Athens", 2018. The player assumes the role of an opera singer –dressed as a Valkyrie- who is in a dream state and tries to escape a swarming group of fans and reporters. The obstacles the singer encounters in this theater-inspired dream world are thick glass fragments where she has to break them in order to escape being caught by the crowd.
